爪.definition: (coll.) foot of an animal or bird; (coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc

爪兒.definition: paws (of small animal); foot of a utensil; stupid person

爪哇八哥.definition: (bird species of China) Javan myna (Acridotheres javanicus)

爪哇國.definition: ancient state located in present-day Java 爪哇[Zhao3wa1]; (fig.) somewhere remote, inaccessible or obscure

爪哇池鷺.definition: (bird species of China) Javan pond heron (Ardeola speciosa)

爪哇禾雀.definition: (bird species of China) Java sparrow (Lonchura oryzivora)

爪字頭.definition: Chinese character component 爫, used in 乳[ru3], 愛|爱[ai4] etc

爪牙.definition: pawn; lackey; accomplice (in crime); collaborator; henchman; claws and teeth
